content:
# The smelting process has produced 5 iron plates in total, and the furnace currently has 4 units of iron ore remaining. 
# However, I still have no iron plates in my inventory, which means I need to extract them from the furnace.

# I will now extract the 5 iron plates from the furnace to add them to my inventory.
extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, furnace.position, quantity=5)  # Extracting 5 iron plates

# Checking inventory after extraction
print(f"Inventory after extracting iron plates: {inspect_inventory()}")
